name: mafl
description: Mafl is a self-hosted feed and blog aggregator similar to Feedly. It allows subscribing to RSS/Atom feeds, filtering stories, and reading articles via a simple responsive web interface.
features: RSS aggregation: Subscribe to multiple RSS and Atom feeds from blogs, news sites, and podcasts in one interface.
Article filtering: Create custom filters to show only relevant content based on keywords or sources.
Read tracking: Mark articles as read or unread to maintain your reading progress across sessions.
Responsive design: Access your feeds from any device with a mobile-friendly, adaptive interface.
OPML import/export: Migrate feed subscriptions easily from other readers using standard OPML format.
Search functionality: Find specific articles across all subscriptions using full-text search.
Folder organization: Group related feeds into folders for better content management.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and manage articles efficiently with customizable keyboard commands.
Article preview: Read content directly in the interface without visiting external websites.
Feed discovery: Find and subscribe to new feeds through built-in search and recommendations.
